Class AudioManager

java.lang.Object
controller.AudioManager
public class AudioManager extends Object
Manages all audio playback for the game, including sound effects (SFX) and music. This class follows the Singleton pattern to provide a centralized point of control for audio. It pre-loads all sound effects to ensure low-latency playback during gameplay.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AudioManager getInstance()
      Returns the single instance of the AudioManager, creating it if necessary.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of AudioManager.

    • loadSound

      public void loadSound(String name, String filename)
      Loads a single sound file from the given path and stores it as a Clip in the soundClips map.
      Parameters:
      name - The key to associate with the sound.
      filename - The resource path to the audio file.

    • play

      public void play(String name)
      Plays a pre-loaded sound effect once. If the sound is already playing, it is stopped and restarted from the beginning.
      Parameters:
      name - The key of the sound to play.

    • loop

      public void loop(String name)
      Plays a pre-loaded sound effect in a continuous loop. If the sound is already looping, this method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      name - The key of the sound to loop.

    • stop

      public void stop(String name)
      Stops a sound effect that is currently playing or looping.
      Parameters:
      name - The key of the sound to stop.

    • loopMusic

      public void loopMusic(String filename)
      Streams and plays a music file in a continuous loop. If other music is already playing, it will be stopped first.
      Parameters:
      filename - The resource path to the music file.

    • stopMusic

      public void stopMusic()
      Stops the currently playing background music.

    • loopMenuMusic

      public void loopMenuMusic(String name)
      Plays the main menu music in a loop. Stops any other playing music before starting.
      Parameters:
      name - The key of the menu music clip.

    • stopMenuMusic

      public void stopMenuMusic()
      Stops the main menu music if it is playing.

    • stopAllSounds

      public void stopAllSounds()
      Stops all currently playing sound effects and music clips. This is useful when pausing the game or transitioning between states.
